           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17029903">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17029903">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17029903">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Historical overviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17029903">
          <div id="boxatt17029903" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24954268">
              <a id="link_24954268" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954268,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077133">
              <a id="link_20077133" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077133,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               By library subscription. Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24954346">
              <a id="link_24954346" href="http://universitypublishingonline.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/cambridge/histories/ebook.jsf?bid=CBO9781139053778" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954346,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24954346}); ">
               Cambridge History of the Native Peoples of the Americas Vol. 2, Mesoamerica. Part 1
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. See table of contents for geographic areas covered.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24954348">
              <a id="link_24954348" href="http://universitypublishingonline.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/cambridge/histories/ebook.jsf?bid=CBO9781139053464" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954348,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24954348}); ">
               The Cambridge History of the Native Peoples of the Americas Volume 2: Mesoamerica, Part 2
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. See table of contents.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24954350">
              <a id="link_24954350" href="http://universitypublishingonline.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/cambridge/histories/ebook.jsf?bid=CBO9781139053785" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954350,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24954350}); ">
               The Cambridge History of the Native Peoples of the Americas Volume 3: South America, Part 1
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. See table of contents.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24954354">
              <a id="link_24954354" href="http://universitypublishingonline.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/cambridge/histories/ebook.jsf?bid=CBO9781139053792" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954354,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24954354}); ">
               The Cambridge History of the Native Peoples of the Americas Volume 3: South America, Part 2
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. See table of contents.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24965499">
              Native Peoples of South America
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes a map of native ethnic groups through South and Central America. Use index to pinpoint discussion of the various groups. ON RESERVE for HST 293
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24965509">
              Cambridge Encyclopedia of Latin America and the Caribbean
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Nice overviews of native peoples of both Central and South America.  ON RESERVE for HST 293
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17029905">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17029905">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17029905">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17029905">
          <div id="boxatt17029905" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077147">
              <a id="link_20077147" href="http://estadisticas.cepal.org/cepalstat/WEB_CEPALSTAT/Portada.asp?idioma=i" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077147,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20077147}); ">
               CEPALSTAT
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Published by the United Nations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077150">
              <a id="link_20077150" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077150,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Authoritative. Widely used. Arguably the most current. Utilizes U.S. Census Bureau algorithms and definitions rather than U.N.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077153">
              <a id="link_20077153" href="http://data.worldbank.org/data-catalog/world-development-indicators" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077153,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20077153}); ">
               World Development Indicators
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource from the World Bank. Authoritative. Documents all sources.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17029906">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17029906">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17029906">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Current events
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17029906">
          <div id="boxatt17029906" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077108">
              <a id="link_20077108" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077108,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               By library subscription. Popular articles from a variety of news sources, especially magazines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077165">
              <a id="link_20077165" href="http://news.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077165,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776525}); ">
               Google news
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Freely available newspaper articles online. Good for identifying current event topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077167">
              <a id="link_20077167" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077167,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               By library subscription. Search either major world papers in English, or news sources from the subject country in Spanish or Portuguese. Better searched than browsed. Current issues plus deep archive.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24954957">
              <a id="link_24954957" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24954957,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern Latin American and Caribbean History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17029908">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17029908">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17029908">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17029908">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17029908" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
